From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 Indian filmKaam Chalu HaiOfficial release posterDirected byPalash MuchhalWritten byPalash MuchhalStarring
Rajpal Yadav
Giaa Manek
Kurangi Nagraj
CinematographyPathan Parvez KhanEdited bySayan MalMusic byPalash MuchhalSaurabh Singh SengarProductioncompaniesBaseline StudiosPal Music & FilmsDistributed byZEE5Release date
19 April 2024 (2024-04-19)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Kaam Chalu Hai (transl. Work is in progress) is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language drama film written and directed by Palash Muchhal, starring Rajpal Yadav, Giaa Manek, and Kurangi Nagraj in the leading roles. The film is based on the real-life story of Manoj Patil. It is produced by Baseline Studios and Pal Music & Films.[1]
Kaam Chalu Hai has been chosen for promotion by IMPPA (Indian Motion Picture Producers' Association) at the Cannes Film Festival 2024.[1] The film is set to be digitally released on 19 April 2024 on ZEE5.[2]


Premise[edit]
The story revolves around Manoj Patil, a devoted father whose life is shattered when his daughter Gudiya dies in a tragic accident caused by administrative negligence. Determined to prevent such tragedies from recurring, Manoj transforms his grief into a revolutionary movement to ensure the safety of other children. As he seeks justice for Gudiya and fights to protect other daughters from similar fates, his inspirational story unfolds, highlighting the power of turning personal pain into positive action.

Cast[edit]
Rajpal Yadav as Monoj Patil
Giaa Manek as Radha
Kurangi Nagraj as Gudiya
Production[edit]
The film was officially announced on July 20, 2023, with the poster featuring film lead Rajpal Yadav.[3] The film is a second collaboration of Palash Muchhal with actor Rajpal Yadav after Ardh.[4] Giaa Manek marks her OTT debut with the film.[5] Director Palaash Muchhal stated, "Kaam Chalu Hai explores a theme often overlooked in our society, shedding light on a harsh reality. With every project, my aim is to resonate with audiences and evoke a sense of connection, and this film does exactly that."[2] The filming was held in Sangli, Maharashtra, wrapped up in August 2023.[6]

Release[edit]
The trailer was released on April 9, 2024.[7] The film is scheduled to be released on April 19, 2024, on OTT platform ZEE5.[2]
